alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Buffalo County through 815 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kearney, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kearney. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 271 and 274, and between mile markers 278 and 282, and near mile marker 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
